title: Rainy city driving, almost stopped at intersection
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly in the rain, stopping at a red light.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic light is red and the pedestrian crossing is empty. The buildings on the side of the road are tall and gray. The rain is falling heavily and the visibility is low.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to avoid skidding on the wet road. It stops at the red light to wait for the pedestrian to cross safely. The driver is cautious and attentive, scanning the surroundings for any potential hazards.
